QuestData.Title: Bring Down the High Shaman
QuestData.Description: Our scouts in the field report that High Shaman MacKilligan has moved out of Thundermar and is fighting amidst the Thundermar Ruins northwest of here, across the river.$B$BHe's a dangerous one, $n, responsible for the deaths of many a Dragonmaw. He WILL be destroyed, that is not the question.$B$BThe question is: will you be the one to earn the glory of the kill?
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Must not be allowed to kill again!
